entry.title: Ocean Parkway (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that horse and sleigh racing once took place on Ocean Parkway (pictured)?

entry.title: islands (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that islands are home to an estimated 41 percent of land vertebrates at risk of extinction?

entry.title: Ken Goldin (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Ken Goldin has sold more than US$1.3 billion in collectibles?

entry.title: Baltimore Museum and Gallery of Fine Arts (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that one of the items on display at the Baltimore Museum and Gallery of Fine Arts was George Washington's shaving brush?

entry.title: Fred Thomas (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that before Fred Thomas became an MP, he was the Royal Marines' light heavyweight boxing champion?

entry.title: Hey Sensei, Don't You Know? (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Fumika Baba had to learn how to draw for her role in the live-action drama adaptation of Hey Sensei, Don't You Know?

entry.title: William P. Dole (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that before becoming a commissioner of Indian affairs, William P. Dole was only known to have encountered Native Americans once in his life?

entry.title: In C Mali (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that the pulse stops during the soliloquy of In C Mali?

entry.title: Roberto Quintanilla (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Bolivian intelligence officer Roberto Quintanilla was responsible for cutting off Che Guevara's hands?
